text.div:
Generated Narrative: CodeSystem paymentstatus

Last updated: 2024-04-24 00:00:00+0000

Profile: Shareable CodeSystem

This case-sensitive code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/paymentstatus defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
paid PaidThe payment has been sent physically or electronically.
cleared ClearedThe payment has been received by the payee.

name: PaymentStatusCodes
title: Payment Status Codes
description: This value set includes a sample set of Payment Status codes.

concept.definition: The payment has been sent physically or electronically.
The payment has been received by the payee.
